997910.name: Fantasy Grounds - 20 things #18: Troublesome Treasures (Any Ruleset)
997910.description:
20 things #18: Troublesome Treasures

Are you a busy GM? Does session prep take too long? Do you never have time to work on the cool little details that can bring your session to life?
Well fear not! That's where the 20 Things line comes in. Compiled from the free 20 Things posts available at Raging Swan's website, this short, focused compilation gives you, the time-crunched GM, the tools to effortlessly add verisimilitude and detail to your adventure.
Use the material herein either before or during play and bask in your players' adulation. This instalment provides five tables designed to help you flesh out and bring to life the troublesome treasures in your campaign! Fully converted to Fantasy Grounds and usable in any system.
This product includes:
  • A full reference manual
  • 5 rollable tables with detailed text describing Troublesome Treasures
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Michael Potter
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
